name: EverLite
description:
EverLite is a mobile endless runner.  Explore the mysterious caves, dodge spikey vines,  shiny crystals and pointy stalagmites. Collect glistening gems, find new friends and watch your community grow!

EverLite is a 2D endless runner adaptation of the game EverLight. 

LEAD GAME DEVELOPER & ARTIST

Sey Atkinson

AUDIO DESIGNER 

Thomas Meo

GAMEPLAY PROGRAMMING

Coby Jennings

AI PROGRAMMING

Caleb Otto-Hayes

PROC GEN PROGRAMMING

Dillon Curry
